comments.raw_text:
It looks like these are the issue I see. 
1. I have set Anjali as my default Malayalam font 
   but it looks like Karthika was taken.
2. It looks like the problem character is the chill-letter
   and if a character is missing we should be printing others

Similar issue occurred in Bug 362527 and we resolved it earlier.
